solution_line_template: Between Monday and Sunday there are {total_days} days. If she will be using the same shirt for {days_with_same_shirt} days then she will need clothes for {total_days} - {days_with_same_shirt} = <<{total_days}-{days_with_same_shirt}={days_with_different_shirts}>>{days_with_different_shirts} days

Because she wants to use {shirts_per_day} different shirts each of those {days_with_different_shirts} days then she needs {shirts_per_day} * {days_with_different_shirts} = <<{shirts_per_day}*{days_with_different_shirts}={shirts_for_different_days}>>{shirts_for_different_days} shirts

In total she will need {shirts_for_different_days} shirts between Tuesday and Saturday and {shirts_for_same_days} shirt for Monday and Sunday = <<{shirts_for_different_days}+{shirts_for_same_days}={total_shirts}>>{total_shirts} shirts
